select a.*,b.dictname as jobName ,c.dictname as JobLevelName,decode(a.ISCANCE,'0','正常','1','作废') IsCanceName from GI_UserInfo a left join GI_CODEDICT b on a.job=b.dictcode and b.parentid=409 left join GI_CODEDICT c on a.job=c.dictcode and c.parentid=430
a.OrganId=:OrganId a.USERNAME like '%#UserName#%'

select a.* from GI_FunInfo a where a.ISCANCE=0
exists (select 1 from GI_ROLERIGHT b where b.funid = a.funid and exists (select 1 from GI_ROLEMEMBER c where b.roleid = c.roleid and c.userid =:UserId)) a.sysid=:SysId a.funlevel=:FunLevel
order by a.displaysort,a.funid

select B.*,A.USERID,A.ISDEFAULT from GI_USERSYS A inner JOIN GI_SYSAPPINFO B oN A.sysID = B.sysID
a.userid=:UserId
order by b.displaysort ,a.sysid
